t: Assign a Checking Account as a Payment Option - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you don't have a credit card, you can pay for products with an ACH-enabled U.S. checking account (Automated Clearing House enabled account).

t: Amazon Business Account Payments - Add Bank Account Details - Amazon Customer Service
s: Easily set up ACH payments on your Amazon Business account. Add and manage bank account details through Accounts Payable Settings. Pay bills seamlessly online

t: Managing your ACH direct debit payment methods - AWS Billing
s: If you meet the eligibility requirements, you can add a US bank account as an ACH direct debit payment method to your payment methods.

t: Amazon Buying Policies for Pay By Invoice with Business Accounts - Amazon Customer Service
s: We currently accept wire, ACH funds transfer, or check payment. Payment by cash, money order, debit or credit cards is not supported. All payments must be made in U.S.

t: Managing credit card and ACH direct debit - AWS Billing
s: Add and verify your credit card and ACH payment methods for your AWS account.

t: Amazon Invoices Payment Method with Business Accounts - Amazon Customer Service
s: Automated Clearing House (ACH) debit (preferred option, no email remittance required): Amazon withdraws the payment from your account on the payment date once you've initiated the payment. To start this payment, visit the Your Invoices for Pay by Invoice page and select Make a payment.
